card.name: Aladdin
card.des: In this live-action retelling of 1992 classic, Aladdin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that can make their deepest wishes come true.

card.des: Two brothers Vibhooti and Chiraunji have ‘fought’ their share of ghosts. However, a new case forces them to rethink their own abilities and beliefs.

card.des: Running against the clock, IAF Squadron Leader Vijay Karnik created history with determination and his love for the country. A daredevil story of guts and glory.

card.des: Winners from noted dance competitions fight to retain their title against Challengers, who give another go at becoming the ultimate Dance Champions.

card.name: Dil Bechara

card.name: Dishoom
card.des: A no-nonsense cop accompanied by a rookie go on a 36-hour manhunt for a missing Indian cricketer, who has been kidnapped under mysterious circumstances.

card.name: Doctor Strange
card.des: A no-nonsense cop accompanied by a rookie go on a 36-hour manhunt for a missing Indian cricketer, who has been kidnapped under mysterious circumstances.

card.des: Guy, a bank teller, discovers he is a background player in an open-world video game and decides to become the hero of his own story.

card.des: Summers span decades. Winters can last a lifetime. Whilst kingdoms fight each other for the control of Westeros, a sinister force lurks beyond the Wall.

card.name: Chernobyl
card.des: Chernobyl dramatizes the story of the 1986 nuclear accident, one of the worst man-made catastrophes - and of the sacrifices made to save Europe from disaster.

card.name: City Of Dreams
card.des: Ameya Gaikwad has lost everything to his daughter, Poornima. As her popularity grows, so does his desperation to stop her from eclipsing him completely.

card.name: City on a hill
card.des: In the early 1990s Boston, assistant district attorney Decourcy Ward forms an unlikely alliance with a corrupt yet venerated FBI veteran, Jackie Rhodes.

card.des: Mohamed Salah bagged his 100th Premier League goal in Liverpool's convincing win over 10-man Leeds United in Gameweek 4

card.des: Cristiano Ronaldo's brace on his Manchester United return left Old Trafford and Newcastle in a daze in Gameweek 4 of Premier League 2021/22

card.des: Leon Bailey was in inspiring form and got on the scoresheet to help Aston Villa thump Everton in Gameweek 5 of Premier League 2021/22

card.des: Martin Odegaard's sublime free kick helped Arsenal see off a spirited Burnley in Gameweek 5 of Premier League 2021/22

card.des: Liverpool produced a scintillating attacking display to crush Crystal Palace in Gameweek 5 of Premier League 2021/22

card.name: GW 5: Man City 0-0 Southampton
card.des: Manchester City failed to break down a feisty Southampton to split points in Gameweek 5 of Premier League 2021/22

card.name: GW 5: Newcastle 1-1 Leeds United
card.des: Newcastle and Leeds United shared the points after an end to end encounter in Gameweek 5 of Premier League 2021/22

card.des: Watford put up a commendable display to prolong Norwich's winless run in Gameweek 5 of Premier League 2021/22

card.name: GW 5: Wolves 0-2 Brentford
card.des: Ivan Toney scored and grabbed an assist to help 10-man Brentford earn an impressive win against Wolves in Gameweek 5 of Premier League 2021/22

card.name: Hannah Montana
card.des: Miley Stewart lives a double life as a famous pop singer named Hannah Montana and constantly tries to conceal her true identity from the public.

card.name: Hostages
card.des: Reneging on the deal to kill the CM, Prithvi plans to smuggle him to Nepal but ends up in a hostage crisis again. Amid threats old and new, a conspiracy unfolds.

card.name: House Of Saddam
card.des: This miniseries offers a detailed portrait of the workings of Saddam Hussein's family and his relationship with his advisors and the dictator's 17-year reign.

card.name: Housefull 4
card.des: A set of six lovers had to part ways in 1419. Six centuries later, they meet again only to realise that they are marrying the wrong partners. Old villains and a series of mishaps turn this reincarnation drama into a comedy of errors.

card.name: Hungama 2
card.des: The Kapoors, Bajajs and Tiwaris lead picture-perfect lives until a young woman named Vaani arrives with an utterly cute bundle of joy in tow.

card.name: Incredibles 2
card.des: Mr. Incredible is left to care for the newborn while Missus out saving the world, but the going gets tough for the family with the arrival of a powerful villain.

card.name: VIVO IPL 2021: Story So Far
card.des: As VIVO IPL 2021 is set to resume in UAE, here's all that happened during the first leg in India earlier this year

card.name: Iron Man 3
card.des: Tony Stark encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin, and after failing to him, he embarks on a journey with relentless consequences.

card.name: John Adams
card.des: Following the Boston Massacre, John Adams takes on the role of serving as the defense attorney for the British soldiers.

card.name: Khuda Haafiz
card.des: A newly married couple's life falls in jeopardy when his wife goes missing under mysterious circumstances.

card.name: Kohli to Quit T20I Captaincy
card.des: Jatin Sapru talks to Parthiv Patel, Irfan Pathan and Aakash Chopra on Virat Kohli's call to give up T20I captaincy

card.name: The Legend of Hanuman
card.des: Since his powers were bound in childhood, Hanuman now lives as a simple vaanar warrior serving King Sugreev, until an encounter with two human princes sets him on a new path.

card.name: Live Telecast
card.des: Retelling real-life paranormal stories is what Jenny and her team does best, and their show, Dark Tales, is proof of that. But the otherworldly may be closer than they think.

card.name: Mahi's Swag Mantra
card.des: A trip down memory lane of the different looks of MS Dhoni over the years!

card.name: MasterChef India
card.des: Talented cooks rustle up their signature dishes in a limited time as celebrity chefs, Vineet Bhatia, Ranveer Brar and Vikas Khanna assess their culinary skills in the intense audition rounds.

card.name: Disney Mickey Mouse Clubhouse
card.des: Daisy Duck has lost Bo Peep's sheep and doesn't know where to find them!

card.name: Mission Mangal
card.des: Based on the true story of India's finest scientists who rose above hardships and failures to make us the only country to reach Mars in its first attempt.

card.name: Modern Family
card.des: Jay has grown children, grandchildren, and a gorgeous young wife who has a pre-teen son of her own; all together they must bridge generational, cultural, and social gaps.

card.name: OK Computer
card.des: When a self-driving car kills a pedestrian, prickly Cyber Cell detective Saajan Kundu teams up with his estranged partner Laxmi Suri to investigate. But was this an accident?

card.name: Rapid Fire with Kai Havertz
card.des: Get up close and personal with Chelsea's star striker Kai Havertz in a Disney+ hotstar exclusive

card.name: The Sopranos
card.des: After a series of anxiety attacks, New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano agrees to see a psychiatrist.

card.name: Special Ops
card.des: When a set of R&AW officials are asked to create an audit report of Himmat Singh’s "miscellaneous" expenses, a nineteen-year-old theory finally sees a glimmer of light.

card.name: Super Kings Celebrate in Style
card.des: Take a look at the title celebrations after MS Dhoni led Chennai Super Kings to their fourth VIVO IPL crown

card.name: Super 30
card.des: Based on the life of ace mathematician Anand Kumar, who trained 30 underprivileged students to crack one of the toughest entrance exams in India - IIT.

card.name: Tanhaji
card.des: As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.

card.name: Team Recap: CSK
card.des: Chennai Super Kings returned to their absolute best in the first half of VIVO IPL 2021 so can they continue that momentum?

card.name: Team Recap: DC
card.des: Delhi Capitals were once again brilliant in the first half of VIVO IPL 2021 as they hunt their maiden title after coming so close in 2020

card.name: Team Recap: MI
card.des: Mumbai Indians blew hot and cold in the first half of VIVO IPL 2021, but will they finish well to become the first team to win three straight titles?

card.name: Team Recap: SRH
card.des: Sunrisers Hyderabad won just once in the first half of VIVO IPL 2021, but is there a miracle in store in the second half under Kane Williamson?

card.name: The Empire
card.des: After King of Ferghana Umar Shaikh's death, young Babur assumes responsibility for an entire kingdom while scheming vultures outside and inside Ferghana’s walls circle the throne.

card.name: The Hunt
card.des: Holding on to a past tragedy, Maj. Rajveer Shergill returns home to his estranged father. In the meantime, his younger brother Rahul goes missing under mysterious circumstances.

card.name: Tottenham vs Chelsea: The Players
card.des: The upcoming Premier League 2021/22 clash between Tottenham and Chelsea will see Harry Kane square up against Romelu Lukaku
